about_the_game:
Phantom Squad is a top-down shooter, with heavy emphasis on tactics; either fighting solo, or as a team of 2-4 players, strategize, adapt, and triumph together against relentless adversaries across a series of intense levels.

Infiltrate or assault a handful of places and complete various objectives (neutralizing hostiles, getting intel, rescuing hostages, extracting a VIP,..).

Betrayed, left for dead, you are now the Phantom Squad, obeying no law or jurisdiction and seeking nothing but revenge.

In the demo, you will play through the tutorial and first mission of the game. There'll be a limited arsenal of weapons and equipment that you can access, but will give a great taste of what's to offer in the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Players engage in missions in which they are expected to shoot enemies in order to complete their objective.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660ti or AMD R9 270 with 2+ GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Phantom Squad is an intense 1-4 player tactical top-down shooter combining fast-paced combat with real-time strategy. Assemble your squad, plan your route, choose your loadout, and execute. Use a versatile arsenal to tackle brutal missions; stick to the plan or adapt to survive the chaos
